abstract: Nicolás Andrés Burdisso (born 12 April 1981) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a central or right defender for Genoa.Previously of Boca Juniors and Inter Milan, Burdisso played 49 internationals for Argentina from his debut in 2003. He was selected for two FIFA World Cups and two Copa Americas, and was part of the team which won Gold at the 2004 Summer Olympics.
